item.title: [COLOR red][B]******* Cần Addon Plexus & Addon f4mTester *******[/B][/COLOR]

item.item:
////////////////////////////////////////
[COLOR yellow][B]->> XEM THI ĐẤU CÁC MÔN THỂ THAO QUỐC TẾ:Bóng đá, bóng rổ, tenis...(Auto Update hàng ngày) - Theo Giờ VN + 6 Tiếng[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param1] ([makelist.param3])[/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>https://s24.postimg.org/k5bimyrpx/sport.jpg</thumbnail>
\n(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,15}tuttosportweb.com/(.*?).[\w\W\s]{0,15}blank">(.*?)< http://tuttoserie.blogspot.com/p/daily.html
getUrl #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m, param=''):
import requests import re import base64
try:
id = re.findall("javascript.*?id='(.*?)'", page_data)[0] url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream.php?id=' + id + '&cache=4&width=600&height=450&stretching=uniform&p=1&c=0' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.100 Safari/537.36', 'Referer': 'http://tuttosportweb.com/update/ch1.html'} source = requests.get(url, headers = headers) curl = re.findall('trap = "(.*?)"', source.text)[0] m3u8 = base64.b64decode(curl)
url2 = 'http://bro.adca.st/ckcskr.php' headers2 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.100 Safari/537.36', 'Referer': url, 'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} source2 = requests.get(url2, headers = headers2) token = re.findall('"rumba":"(.*?)"', source2.text)[0]
return m3u8 + token + '|Referer=http%3A%2F%2Fbro.adca.st%2Fstream.php%3Fid%3D2598%26cache%3D4%26width%3D700%26height%3D480%26stretching%3Duniform%26p%3D1&User-Agent=Mozilla%2F5.0%20%28Windows%20NT%206.1%3B%20WOW64%29%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20%28KHTML%2C%20like%20Gecko%29%20Chrome%2F54.0.2840.100%20Safari%2F537.36&X-Requested-With=ShockwaveFlash/23.0.0.162'
except Exception as e: print 'wizhdsports: Error: ' if hasattr(e, 'code'): print str(e.code) if hasattr(e, 'reason'): print " " + str(e.reason)
http://tuttosportweb.com/update/[makelist.param2].html http://tuttosportweb.com Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:19.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/19.0
https://s24.postimg.org/k5bimyrpx/sport.jpg

<item><title>[COLOR lightblue] [makelist.param3][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[hash]|Referer=http://streamking.cc/[makelist.param1]&User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/46.0.2490.80 Safari/537.36</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>source: '(.*?)'</expres> <page>http://streamking.cc/player?channel=[makelist.param1]&player=clappr</page> <referer>http://streamking.cc</referer> <thumbnail>http://1streamking.co/[makelist.param2]</thumbnail> </regex> </item>
tv-block[\w\W\s]{0,18}href="/(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,48}src="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,27}alt="(.*?)" http://streamking.cc/ https://s24.postimg.org/k5bimyrpx/sport.jpg

<title>[COLOR lightblue][makelist.param1][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[select_Url]</link> <regex> <name>select_Url</name> <expres>$pyFunction: '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36' if not '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'=='' else '$doregex[hls]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'</expres> <page></page> </regex> <regex> <name>progressive</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <regex> <name>hls</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ft4uzzz4n/sport.jpg</thumbnail>
